infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos of nutrition labels for automatic nutrition analysis.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select nutrition label images for automatic nutrition analysis.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you select nutrition label images for automatic nutrition analysis.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your camera to let you take photos of nutrition labels for automatic nutrition analysis.
